SCR_TEXT_9915:
SINCE YOU KEEP YOUR
PHONE MOSTLY MUTE.../
SCR_TEXT_9916:
THERE IS NO POINT IN

SO I DECIDED TO ADD A
NOTE TO OUR SOCK
DISCCUSION./
SCR_TEXT_9918:
SINCE I KNOW YOU'D RATHER
CONTINUE A JOKE THAN TO
HAVE A PROPER TALK./
SCR_TEXT_9919:
SANS^1, YOU TOLD ME TO BE
WARY OF THE HUMAN...//
SCR_TEXT_9920:
BUT THAT YOU RESPECTED
AND HAD FAITH IN
WHATEVER I CHOSE TO DO,/
SCR_TEXT_9922:
AND WHILE I ABSO^1-DABSO^1-
LUTELY THINK I CAN SWAY
THE HUMAN FROM THIS PATH/
SCR_TEXT_9923:
THERE IS A TINSY LITTLE
CHANCE I MIGHT NOT
RETURN./
SCR_TEXT_9924:
I THANK YOU FOR
SUPPORTING MY DECISION./
SCR_TEXT_9925:
BUT^1, IN CASE IT DOES
TURN FOR THE WORST.../
SCR_TEXT_9926:
IT IS TIME I AM HONEST
WITH YOU^1.
TRULY^1, HONEST./
SCR_TEXT_9927:
EVER SINCE I WAS A BABY
BONES.../
SCR_TEXT_9928:
YOUR LACK OF ENERGY
ALWAYS ANNOYED ME!/
SCR_TEXT_9929:
DESPITE THAT^1, THOUGH^1,
YOU ALWAYS FOUND THE
ODD JOB TO GET US BY./
SCR_TEXT_9930:
TAKING CARE OF ME NO
MATTER WHAT./
SCR_TEXT_9931:
I WILL ALWAYS BE
GRATEFUL FOR IT^1, AND
SOMETIMES.../
SCR_TEXT_9932:
I EVEN SMILE AT YOUR
JOKES./
SCR_TEXT_9933:
ESPECIALLY WHEN YOU'D
SMILE TO YOURSELF./
SCR_TEXT_9934:
HOWEVER^1, THESE JOKES..^1.
BECAME ALL THAT YOU
ARE./
SCR_TEXT_9935:
YOU DON'T EXPLAIN SCIENCE
FACTS TO ME LIKE WHEN I
WAS LITTLE./
SCR_TEXT_9936:
YOU ONLY PLAY THE
TROMBONE FOR COMEDY.../
SCR_TEXT_9937: AND NOT THROUGHOUT THE DAY LIKE YOU USED TO./
SCR_TEXT_9938:
AT GRILLBY'S^1, ALL YOU DO
IS CRACK JOKES.../
SCR_TEXT_9939:
YOU NEVER TALK ABOUT
YOUR DAY./
SCR_TEXT_9941:
YOU ALWAYS LEAVE RIGHT
AFTER YOUR ACT IS
DONE.../
SCR_TEXT_9942:
IT'S LIKE..^1. YOU CANNOT
EXIST WITHOUT THERE BEING
A JOKE^1. AT ALL./
SCR_TEXT_9943:
REPLACING EVERYTHING YOU
ARE WITH A PUNCHLINE.../
SCR_TEXT_9944:
I DON'T KNOW WHAT
HAPPENED^1, BROTHER./
SCR_TEXT_9945:
I HOPED OVER THE YEARS^1, YOU WOULD TELL ME ONE
DAY./
SCR_TEXT_9946:
BUT^1, OH WELL^1, THAT'S ON
ME TO NOT PUSH HARDER./
SCR_TEXT_9947:
TRYING TO GET YOU TO NOT
BE LAZY WASN'T ENOUGH.../
SCR_TEXT_9948:
REGARDLESS OF IT ALL
THOUGH^1, I AM PROUD OF
YOU!/
SCR_TEXT_9949:
FOR LOOKING AFTER ME AND
BELIEVING IN ME NO MATTER
WHAT./
SCR_TEXT_9950:
SO I WILL TELL YOU THE
SAME THING I WILL TELL
THE HUMAN^1, MORE OR LESS!/
SCR_TEXT_9953:
YOU MAY NEVER AGAIN BE
THE PERSON I USED TO
KNOW./
SCR_TEXT_9954:
BUT I KNOW YOU CAN BE A
BETTER YOU THAT YOU ARE
NOW!/
SCR_TEXT_9955: AND FOR THAT^1, YOU NEED TO DO MORE./
SCR_TEXT_9956:
FOR YOUR OWN SAKE^1, NOT
JUST MINE./
SCR_TEXT_9957:
ESPECIALLY IF I DO NOT
COME BACK./
SCR_TEXT_9959:
*SIGNED^1, THE GREAT P^1-
 YOUR LITTLE BROTHER./%%
